PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-09071997-07-030,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
PrecisAmendments to Order in Council P.C. 1997-76 which authorize the Bank of Canada to pay sales commissions on CANADA RSSP BONDS SERIES I to certain Authorized Processing Agents or Authorized Sales Agents on an annual basis, in order to eliminate the need for agents to reimburse advance payments.
Attachments
